alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 4:12AM MST until January 06 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Wind Chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Briggsdale, Sterling, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...Snow will develop this afternoon and may be briefly heavy in the late afternoon and early evening. The snow will end by morning but cold wind chills will persist in the early morning hours. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions developing. Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org
